body: Is it your intent that is most important or securing the best outcome?
body_html: Is it your intent that is most important or securing the best outcome?
title: Do you have a desire to do what is right for the right reason?

body: Different questions, but per the first - yes but only because I'm religious - if I didn't believe in eternity then I doubt I'd bother to do half the stuff I do. I'd just stay at home and lie around, and if you asked me to do anything, I'd just tell you I don't do anything.
body_html: Different questions, but per the first - yes but only because I'm religious - if I didn't believe in eternity then I doubt I'd bother to do half the stuff I do. I'd just stay at home and lie around, and if you asked me to do anything, I'd just tell you I don't do anything.

guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

post.body: Is it your intent that is most important or securing the best outcome?
post.body_html: Is it your intent that is most important or securing the best outcome?
post.title: Do you have a desire to do what is right for the right reason?

author.bio:
Faith, Hope, and Love is the path to Life, Liberty, and Happiness.

There is no justification for any human authority.
author.bio_html:
Faith, Hope, and Love is the path to Life, Liberty, and Happiness.

There is no justification for any human authority.

body:
I kind of always have a kind of follow up question...

Pirates who don't do anything?
body_html:
I kind of always have a kind of follow up question...

body: If you're only doing it because you think you're going to get a reward, that's not the right reason.

body:
That's not what God says, though - He doesn't care why you obey, just obey.

He's not the common picture of "a nice guy" by human standards
body_html:
That's not what God says, though - He doesn't care why you obey, just obey.

He's not the common picture of "a nice guy" by human standards
